sources.title: City Hunter (1993) Jackie Chan | Martial arts mayhem meets cruise ship chaos
sources.description:
Ryo Saeba, a womanizing private detective, teams up with his partner Kaori to rescue a missing billionaire's daughter aboard a luxury cruise ship. Chaos erupts when terrorists hijack the vessel, forcing Ryo to unleash his martial arts skills and comedic wit to save the day.


Original title: 城市獵人 (City Hunter)
Alternative titles: Sing si lip yan (Cantonese), City Hunter: Shijō Saikyō no Mission (Japan)

Director: Wong Jing
Writers: Wong Jing (adaptation of Tsukasa Hōjō’s manga City Hunter)

Main cast:
Jackie Chan – Ryo Saeba (Meng Bo)
Joey Wong – Kaori Makimura (Carrie Imamura)
Kumiko Goto – Kiyoko Imamura
Richard Norton – Colonel "Big Mac" MacDonald

Genres: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts
Release date: January 14, 1993 (Hong Kong)
Filming locations: Hong Kong


Availability varies by region
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbtxZGahjOpER2huEhTG9Rb

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: While searching for the daughter of a Japanese publishing magnate, private investigator Ryu Saeba and his assistant Kaori are caught up in the middle of a cruise liner highjacking. It's up to Ryu to save the day...but can he do it on an empty stomach?
metadata.Actors: Jackie Chan, Richard Norton, Joey Wang
